page.title: 09MEADOWCROFT NURSERIES
page.content: The Meadowcroft Nurseries occupy a site on the Old Woodham Road. The nursery has been trading for twenty- five years and is now run by two brothers. The overall area of the nursery is 2.8 hectares, 1 hectare being under glass or plastic tunnels. There is a large farm shop in which is sold a large variety of garden sundries, tools and ornaments. Due to the poor soil on the site, all topsoil has to be brought in and after sterilisation it is mixed with peat and various fertilizers to make the compost. The nursery specialises in a large range of conifers and also fancy heathers of many colours and types. It employs five people full-time and up to twenty part-time workers.
